#include <stdio.h>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
int main(){
    int cases;scanf("%d",&cases);
    for(int count=0;count<cases;count++){
        int n;scanf("%d",&n);int moves=0;
        for(int t=0;t<n;t++){
            int temp;scanf("%d",&temp);
            moves+=temp/(t+1);
        }if(moves%2==0)printf("BOB\n");
        else printf("ALICE\n");
    }return 0;
}
